nodes.text: Teronto was a statuary artist known around the time of the Mandalorian Wars. Dremullar Obohn di Garthos, one of the curators of the Obohn Gallery of the Industrial Aesthetic on the planet Ralltiir, was aware of Teronto's works.
Teronto's only mention in the Star Wars canon was in the 2008 short story Labor Pains, written by John Jackson Miller.
